title: Violin Music for Charles I [c17] (Hyperion EO36) [FLAC][twistle]
description:
Violin music from a selection of early c17 composers at the English court.

Alfonso Ferrabosco jr : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfonso_Ferrabosco_the_younger
Robert Johnson : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Johnson_(composer)
Stephen Nau (d 1647), Angelo Notari (1566-1663), Maurice Webster (d 1635)
